charges.charge_description: 21:846 In or about and between 11/23/95 and 11/25/95, dfts did knowingly and intentionally conspires to commit offenses against the U.S. (1) knowingly and unlawfully import into the U.S. from a place outside thereof heroin (2) knowingly and unlawfully possess with intent to distribute heroin
